definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: I gaze on the moon as I tread the drear wild.
sentences.chinese: 行在阴霾的旷野我凝视着天上的月。

sentences.english: No more tears, but full of haziness .
The delicate and charming China rose in the tomb garden.
sentences.chinese: 在阴霾天空下，陵园里分外妖娆娇艳的月季。

sentences.english: At worst, the shadows could darken further.
sentences.chinese: 最糟糕的是，阴霾可能进一步笼罩。

sentences.english: Haze Shenron - Haze Shenron is the Dragon of Pollution.
sentences.chinese: 第二天是个阴霾多云的日子。

sentences.english: But it was great that we all rose above it and got out there and started playing again.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们全体将士都拼搏向上，并重新起航走出阴霾。

sentences.english: And with that faith, we will walk out of the shadows of hedonism.
sentences.chinese: 我们如果拥有信念，将会走出享乐主义的阴霾。

sentences.english: And finally, the Madoff scandal continues to provoke extreme horror.
sentences.chinese: 最后，马多夫讹诈案阴霾未散，恐惧的气氛依然存在。
当阴霾的天空只余雷鸣。

sentences.english: The Queen gazed about her at the gloomy winter landscape. The pallor of the sky seemed to her to be Elizabeth's white complexion.
sentences.chinese: 女王凝视着眼前阴霾的冬景。

sentences.english: Volunteers have been providing long term care, hoping to help the family emerge from illness and poverty.
sentences.chinese: 慈济志工长期关怀，要帮助这家人走出贫病阴霾。

sentences.english: The road through the desert shimmered in the haze.
sentences.chinese: 穿过沙漠的路在阴霾里泛着淡光。

sentences.english: Dispelling the gloom briefly was news of two miracle rescues.
sentences.chinese: 两个救援奇迹暂时驱散了阴霾。

sentences.english: Beckenbauer sees only one small cloud on the Bayern horizon this term.
sentences.chinese: 在拜仁的地平线上，贝肯鲍尔这次只有一丝阴霾。

sentences.english: Sentiment was helped by signs of coordinated action to ease the global crisis.
sentences.chinese: 应对全球危机的一致行动缓解了连日以来的阴霾。

sentences.english: Suddenly, through the haze, he saw a bright flash of orange light.
sentences.chinese: 突然，穿过阴霾，他看到了橙色的光在闪现。

definition: lit. to dispel the clouds and see the sun (idiom); fig. to restore justice
